traffic3.manager
Class TrafficManager

java.lang.Object
  traffic3.manager.TrafficManager

public class TrafficManager
extends java.lang.Object

The traffic manager maintains information about traffic simulator objects.

Method Detail

findArea

public TrafficArea findArea(double x,
                            double y)
Find the area that contains a point.

Parameters:
x - The X coordinate.
y - The Y coordinate.
Returns:
The TrafficArea that contains the given point, or null if no such area is found.

getNeighbours

public java.util.Collection<TrafficArea> getNeighbours(TrafficArea area)
Get the neighbouring areas to a TrafficArea.

Parameters:
area - The area to look up.
Returns:
All TrafficAreas that share an edge with the given area.

getNearbyAgents

public java.util.Collection<TrafficAgent> getNearbyAgents(TrafficAgent agent)
Get all agents in the same area or a neighbouring area as an agent.

Parameters:
agent - The agent to look up.
Returns:
All agents (except the input agent) that are in the same or a neighbouring area.

cacheInformation

public void cacheInformation(StandardWorldModel world)
Compute pre-cached information about the world. TrafficArea and TrafficAgent objects must have already been registered with register(TrafficArea) and register(TrafficAgent).

Parameters:
world - The world model.

getTrafficArea

public TrafficArea getTrafficArea(Area a)
Get the TrafficArea that wraps a given Area.

Parameters:
a - The area to look up.
Returns:
The TrafficArea that wraps the given area or null if no such TrafficArea exists.

getTrafficBlockade

public TrafficBlockade getTrafficBlockade(Blockade b)
Get the TrafficBlockade that wraps a given Blockade.

Parameters:
b - The blockade to look up.
Returns:
The TrafficBlockade that wraps the given blockade or null if no such TrafficBlockade exists.

getTrafficAgent

public TrafficAgent getTrafficAgent(Human h)
Get the TrafficAgent that wraps a given human.

Parameters:
h - The human to look up.
Returns:
The TrafficAgent that wraps the given human or null if no such TrafficAgent exists.
